headline: A Look At Verizon (VZ) Valuation As Shares Drift Lower Despite Solid Earnings
summary: With no fresh company specific headlines driving attention today, Verizon Communications (VZ) remains in focus for investors assessing a large US telecom provider that reported US$137.5b in revenue and US$19.8b in net income. See our latest analysis for Verizon Communications. The share price at US$40.52 has seen a 2.8% decline over the past 30 days and a 2.1% decline over 90 days, while the 1 year total shareholder return of 9.3% points to steadier long term momentum.
